title: 客户端崩溃，有没有大佬帮帮...
author: 种子~喵
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2018-11-29 20:13 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I just don't know what went wrong :(

Time: 11/29/18 6:39 PM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from Pixelmon (pixelmon)
Caused by: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError

大佬帮忙看看是什么问题

replies.author: 傻憨憨楚儿
replies.txt_content:
pokemon的mod不完整 貌似是缺少化石机器的数据 （fossil machine ）
应该是mod本体不完整 检查一下吧。还有 这个内存是不是太少了。1024M？

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
java.io.FileNotFoundException: pixelmon:models/blocks/fossil_machine/fossil_extractor_glass.pqc
你的宝可梦Mod少些什么东西,考虑重新下一个?
